Housing plus support bring ongoing benefits for people who have been homeless https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/housing-plus-support-bring-ongoing-benefits-for-people-who-have-been-homeless/6MYMJTT3UVE4HHH6GQPD4RF6XU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/housing-plus-support-bring-ongoing-benefits-for-people-who-have-been-homeless/6MYMJTT3UVE4HHH6GQPD4RF6XU/ New research reveals ongoing support is needed for homeless people.
